name: Join Generator
description: Performs a join on two streams of data (two other generators with processing pipelines) in a distributed fashion.

parameters.name: nodes
parameters.description: Optionally specify on which nodes to run and how many instances you want on each node.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of node handler, one of SingleNode, SomeNodes, AllNodes (leave empty for local execution)

parameters.name: nodes
parameters.description: The nodes to use for this node handler type

parameters.name: instances
parameters.description: The amount of instances per node of this handler type

parameters.name: nodes
parameters.description: The list of nodes to perform the join on, must all be Tuktu nodes.

parameters.name: host
parameters.description: Default is the Play configuration value of akka.remote.netty.tcp.hostname, or 127.0.0.1 if that is not set.

parameters.name: port
parameters.description: Default is the Play configuration value of akka.remote.netty.tcp.port, or 2552 if that is not set.

parameters.name: result
parameters.description: Key whose value determines the resultName, for both streams respectively.
